hero.name: Shon Pazarker
hero.title: Full Stack AI Engineer & Azure Architect
hero.subtitle: Building intelligent systems end-to-end: from AI agents and LLMs to cloud infrastructure. I also share insights about technology and finance.

about.title: About
paragraphs: I'm a Senior Software Engineer at Microsoft, specializing in the intersection of AI and full-stack engineering. I build production-grade AI systems including Copilot agents, LLM-powered applications, and intelligent automation tools using technologies like MCP (Model Context Protocol) and semantic kernels.

My expertise spans the entire stack: from React and Next.js frontends, through .NET and Node.js backends, to Azure cloud architecture with Infrastructure as Code (Bicep, Terraform). I design scalable, secure systems with proper CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and DevOps best practices.

I also work extensively with Python, creating Jupyter notebooks to analyze big data in Kusto. I build agent evaluation frameworks that measure accuracy and use LLMs to iteratively improve system prompts based on evaluation test results.

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
items.description: Owned and delivered enterprise-grade backend capabilities within Microsoft Power Platform and Copilot Studio. Developed a production Kusto Copilot agent converting natural language to KQL. Led backend development of AI-powered Teams applications. Architected the Meeting Prep application from zero to production. Acted as technical leader and mentor, driving architectural decisions across frontend, backend, and AI systems.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.description: Strong front-end expertise with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Delivered projects for Microsoft, Salt Security, Unity (Bidalgo), 10Bis and more. Built apps from scratch using Webpack, Babel, ESLint, Storybook, and Cypress. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and integrated complex data flows using GraphQL and Apollo.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.description: Utilized Azure DevOps for version control and implementing robust CI/CD pipelines. Deployed secure applications on Windows Server environments. Independently developed multiple internal applications using Angular, .NET Core, and Node.js to enhance productivity and operational efficiency.
